name: InetAddressValidator_isValidInet6AddressTest
description: Unit tests for validating IPv6 addresses using InetAddressValidator.

test_cases.name: testValidIPv6Address
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of a valid IPv6 address.

test_cases.name: testInvalidIPv6Address
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of an invalid IPv6 address.

test_cases.name: testIPv6AddressWithPrefix
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of a valid IPv6 address with a prefix.

test_cases.name: testIPv6AddressWithInvalidPrefix
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of an IPv6 address with an invalid prefix.

test_cases.name: testIPv6AddressWithZoneId
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of a valid IPv6 address with a zone ID.

test_cases.name: testIPv6AddressWithInvalidZoneId
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of an IPv6 address with an invalid zone ID.

test_cases.name: testIPv6AddressWithIPv4Ending
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of a valid IPv6 address with an IPv4 ending.

test_cases.name: testIPv6AddressWithInvalidIPv4Ending
test_cases.description: Tests the validation of an IPv6 address with an invalid IPv4 ending.
